verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:30
verses.text: For by thee I have run through a troop: by my God have I leaped over a wall.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:31
verses.text: As for God, his way is perfect; the word of the Lord is tried: he is a buckler to all them that trust in him.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:32
verses.text: For who is God, save the Lord? and who is a rock, save our God?

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:33
verses.text: God is my strength and power: and he maketh my way perfect.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:34
verses.text: He maketh my feet like hinds’ feet: and setteth me upon my high places.
